sentences: Miroslav Radulović, better known as Mirče (Serbian Cyrillic: Мирослав Радуловић Мирче) (born May 20, 1992, in Kruševac, Serbia) is a Serbian pop-folk singer.
He competed in the 2011–12 season of the televised singing contest Zvezde Granda.
He finished in 4th place but was signed to the record label Grand Production.
After a long break, he released song "Placite oci moje" in 2016.
